REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1151 reute d f BC-DELUXE-CHECK-PRINTERS 04-03 0054

TEXT.TITLE: DELUXE CHECK PRINTERS <DLX> RAISES PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Deluxe Check Printers Inc said that due to increased manufacturing costs it is hiking the prices on most of its product lines, effective June 1. The company estimates that the net effect of the price increases equals a 3.5 pct increase in total sales. Reuter
